title: System
description: A description of a star system in a Role Playing Game.

type.description: The type of thingy the data describes, 'system'.

schemaVersion.description: The version of the schema for the data.

url.description: The URL with more information about the system.

technology.description: The rating for the Technology level of the system, range -4 to 4.

environment.description: The rating for the Environment level of the system, range -4 to 4.

resources.description: The rating for the Resources level of the system, range -4 to 4.

aspects.description: The Aspects that are short descriptive phrases capturing what is true and interesting about the system.

position.description: The position of the system on the cluster map.

x.description: The position of the system along the X axis (horizontal) of the map.

y.description: The position of the system along the Y axis (vertical) of the map.
